# new Directions(options)

**Constructor**

Creates a directions object with options you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
constructor(options?: DirectionsConstructorOptions);
```

## Parameters

- **options**: An object containing the options for creating a directions object. This parameter is optional.

## Discussion

To request directions, create an instance of the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Directions] object, then call the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Directions/route] function with a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/DirectionsRequest] object as the first parameter. The second parameter for [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Directions/route] is a callback function, through which MapKit JS returns the directions response asynchronously.

To return directions in a specific language, set [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/DirectionsConstructorOptions/language] in [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/DirectionsConstructorOptions] when you create an instance of the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Directions] object.

## Creating a directions object

- **DirectionsConstructorOptions**: Options that you may provide when creating a directions object.
